name: It's Time To Boss Up!
description:
"It's Time To Boss Up!" is a game created for VimJam2, with a requirement of "boss" and a theme of "on the edge." 

In this game, you are a firefighter who has to save civilians stuck in burning buildings and bring them to the ambulance. You can only carry one person at a time, but if there is a building that is "on the edge," meaning to say that it is almost going to collapse, your character too will be “on the edge," giving you the ability to “boss up." This allows you to carry two people at a time and will speed you up. 

This game was made possible by three high school friends Aaron Limpangan, Timothy Bremer, and Marc Fenix-Dy.

Disclaimer: Kindly download the game if you want the option to explore the map.
